department_name: Department of Records and Archives Management

courses.name: Bachelor of Records and Archives Management
courses.description: This program focuses on managing organizational records and archives, preserving historical documents, and implementing records management systems.

course_units.title: Introduction to Records and Archives Management
course_units.description: Foundations of records and archives management.

course_units.title: Principles of Records Creation and Maintenance
course_units.description: Basic principles of creating and maintaining records.

course_units.title: Information Technology for Records Management
course_units.description: Application of technology in records management.

course_units.title: Records Classification Systems
course_units.description: Principles and practices of records classification.

course_units.title: Legal and Regulatory Environment
course_units.description: Legal framework for records and archives management.

course_units.title: Records Storage and Preservation
course_units.description: Techniques for storing and preserving records and archives.

course_units.title: Electronic Records Management
course_units.description: Management of digital records and electronic documents.

course_units.title: Archival Description and Access
course_units.description: Standards and practices for describing and providing access to archives.

course_units.title: Records Management Systems
course_units.description: Design and implementation of records management systems.

course_units.title: Records Appraisal and Disposition
course_units.description: Principles and practices of appraising and disposing of records.

course_units.title: Archives Administration
course_units.description: Management and administration of archival institutions.

course_units.title: Special Collections Management
course_units.description: Management of special collections and rare materials.

course_units.title: Records Risk Management
course_units.description: Identifying and mitigating risks in records management.

course_units.title: Research Methods in RAM
course_units.description: Research methodologies in records and archives management.

course_units.title: RAM Capstone Project

course_units.title: Information Governance
